title: LF Support Main to Join Team
body:
Looking for support players that would like to join a team, currently the team will be used for ranked teams, climbing in dynamic queue and potentially in the future entering tournaments in which prizes such as RP can be won. (Some of these tournaments include the Oceanic Open Ladder which is the way to the OPL) Currently in the team we have a plat 3 top, plat 4 jg, plat 5 adc and myself.

Requirements are as follows 
- High gold and above 
- Must be able to work with teammates/work well in a team environment
 - Have good communication
 - Ability to understand things like lane swaps and rotations
 - Be able to do some level of shot calling (if it's only for laning phase that's fine too)
- Available every Friday afternoon and weekend   - Have over 200 + ranked games of support this season
 - Be able to play multiple play styles (Aggresive, passive)
 - Champion pool of at least 3
 - Have Skype to communicate with the team
 - Have a microphone/speak English
 - No signs of toxicity 


If you think you meet the requirements and are keen to play in a team either leave a message on the forum or add me on League and I'll get back to you ASAP.

Good luck on the rift -WiseMan

replies.body: I have almost everything on that list except for being at least gold or above. R.I.P. I main {{champion:201}}, {{champion:117}} and{{champion:432}}. Maybe ill be in gold one day.
Quite keen add me if interested still?
